meaningMnemonic: It's <radical>rain</radical>ing on your <radical>spear</radical> that has <radical>winter</radical> <radical>power</radical>. When the warm rain hits your cold, winter spear, it creates <kanji>fog</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Through the <kanji>fog</kanji> you see the shape of a mythical <reading>kiri</reading>n (きり). You can only see the outline through the fog, but you know it's there.
